text: yathA karNaiH zrOSyatha yUyaM vai kintu yUyaM na bhOtsyatha| nEtrairdrakSyatha yUyanjca parijnjAtuM na zakSyatha| tE mAnuSA yathA naiva paripazyanti lOcanaiH| karNai ryathA na zRNvanti na budhyantE ca mAnasaiH| vyAvarttitESu cittESu kAlE kutrApi tairjanaiH| mattastE manujAH svasthA yathA naiva bhavanti ca| tathA tESAM manuSyANAM kriyantE sthUlabuddhayaH| badhirIbhUtakarNAzca jAtAzca mudritA dRzaH|
